ONE.reason: Common English word - conflicts with 'one of', 'this one', etc.

LINK.reason: Common English word - conflicts with 'link to', 'click link', etc.

CAKE.reason: Common English word - conflicts with food references

SAND.reason: Common English word - conflicts with 'sand beach', etc.

MAGIC.reason: Common English word - conflicts with general usage

PRIME.reason: Common English word - conflicts with 'prime time', 'Amazon Prime', etc.

BEAM.reason: Common English word - conflicts with 'beam of light', etc.

PORTAL.reason: Common English word - conflicts with general usage

NEAR.reason: Common English word - conflicts with 'near future', 'near me', etc.

ROSE.reason: Less common in crypto context, but can cause false positives

FLOW.reason: Common English word - conflicts with 'cash flow', 'flow state', etc.

WAVES.reason: Common English word - conflicts with 'sound waves', 'ocean waves', etc.

BLUR.reason: Common English word - conflicts with general usage

LOOKS.reason: Common English word - conflicts with 'looks good', 'looks like', etc.

APE.reason: Common slang word - conflicts with 'ape into', general usage

detection_rules.require_prefix: Ticker must be preceded by $ or # symbol
detection_rules.all_caps_context: If in all-caps and surrounded by other known tickers, allow without prefix
